title: pokerlook
author: pokerlook
content: We're announcing $PKL sale launch which went live recently on our official website ( https://pokerlook.io ).$PKL token is a part of Pokerlook ecosystem and will be used in Pokerlook game as a main playable currency as well as for deposit/withdrawal options.$PKL token can also be staked in a staking pool which generates more $PKL for the user.Total supply is capped at 270M tokens, 70M is reserved and 200M is availible for purchase until the sale closes and token gets listed on Uniswap and later on other exchanges.If you would want to support Pokerlook project or simply stack some $PKL tokens you can do so here:-> https://token.pokerlook.io (Whitepaper availible)Usefull links:Official website: https://pokerlook.ioGame: https://play.pokerlook.ioTwitter: https://twitter.com/pokerlookioDiscord: https://discord.gg/qarfw2TfJv
